@Feargal_Sharkey @Matthew_Wright @EnvAgency @MPGeorgeEustice Well, over population will put increasing strain on our sewage systems which no one considers when considering waterways pollution.  Its not necessarily incompetence, more demographics.

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @MPGeorgeEustice Sadly I don‚Äôt think this Government gives a toss. When questioned they will spout a few figures, when people really interested in our waterways,  have seen with their eyes deterioration of our rivers.

Was a great moment to watch this yesterday - moments where the progress is obvious are always a highlight of working on projects like this!
